attributes.action: Hillsborough, Perverting the course of Justice
attributes.additional_details: All those involved in the editing,or redaction, or removal of parts of original statements submitted by police officers who were on duty at the Hillsborough disaster April 15th 1989 should face criminal charges, specifically Perverting the course of Justice.This would also include any officer of whatever rank who knowingly allowed their original notes/statement to be altered.
